alert.note: Alert for Edmonson; Grayson; Hardin; Hart (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 10:48AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hart, eastern Grayson, southwestern Hardin and northwestern Edmonson Counties through 1115 AM EST/1015 AM CST/... At 1048 AM EST/948 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Leitchfield, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Leitchfield around 1000 AM CST. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
